name: Lea's Doggo
description:
LEA’S DOGGY  🍊 (my sister dog)

Joyeux noël ma soeur, happy christmas my sister !

🍊🍊🍊

Controls : 

- Homepage : Long touch to call the dog, small touch on the dog to pet him

- French Manifestation mini game : Small touch on the yellow line to change roads, avoid the pigs and eat the snacks

🍊🍊🍊

Music : 

  •  Afterthought, Portal and Stick and Rudder by Evan Schaeffer 
  • Bad Nostalgia by Anthem of Rain

Font : Basteleur by Keussel
